desc: 100% NZ owned Hospitality platform that is free for merchants and just a few dollars for our customers - with 10% going to charity! Instant bookings and digital walk-in Koupons! More flexibility, more categories, and our restaurants discount both your food AND your drinks!

layout.text: 20% off Food and Drinks with our off-peak Koupons for 1 to 8 people. Book a spot today for just $2 to $8!
